message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a starting price of $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product for me is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $12,750?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,200?
